short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button that sends the user to a random LemonAmiga.com or Lemon64.com game page. Fixes blurry scaled images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There are several thousand Amiga games listed on LemonAmiga.com. So many that it can be overwhelming to decide which game to read about. This extension adds a button to the top of the page page that will send you to a random game on the LemonAmiga.com website. The same functionality is added to Lemon64.com.

RandomLemon has been developed completely independently from LemonAmiga.com and has no relationship of the developers of that website.
